original_text:
Cash Noire
Rilasciata a giugno del 2020, Cash Noire è tra le ultime slot prodotte dalla ben nota software house NetEnt.
Il tema del gioco si rifà al mondo del romanzo giallo-poliziesco, con uno sfondo che è una vera e propria scena del crimine, con malviventi, investigatori e, ovviamente, le immancabili femmes fatale.
La schermata inziale di Cash Noire si apre con il volto enigmatico di un investigatore, immerso in uno scenario urbano dai contorni tetri, illuminato da luci al neon che rendono la scena molto suggestiva e inquietante.
La schermata di gioco riprende gli stessi colori scuri e anche i simboli che si alternano sui rulli sono riprodotti mantenendo lo stile e l’atmosfera del tema.
Le slot machine firmate dalla software house NetEnt da sempre si contraddistinguono per compartimenti grafici particolarmente curati e, anche nel caso di Cash Noire, la nitidezza e il realismo delle immagini, uniti a un sapiente uso dei colori, fanno si che il giocatore si ritrovi immerso in una Los Angeles malfamata in compagnia di guardie e ladri, per un’esperienza di gioco che, ne siamo certi, non farà fatica a tenervi incollati davanti allo schermo.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Ve lo diciamo subito: se state cercando una slot molto elaborata, caratterizzata da un’alta volatilità e dalla possibilità di ottenere jackpot stellari, be’, in questo caso Cash Noire potrebbe non essere il gioco adatto a voi.
Questa slot machine di casa NetEnt potrebbe essere tranquillamente definita come “una slot per tutti”, sia che voi siate dei giocatori esperti sia che vi stiate affacciando per la prima volta nel mondo dei rulli che girano.
Cash Noire è un gioco con gameplay molto facile e intuitivo, con una bassa volatilità che garantisce premi costanti, sebbene non troppo alti, e supportato da una grafica elegante. La vincita più alta a cui si può ambire è pari a 5.000 volte la puntata, mentre l’RTP si attesta su un più che soddisfacente 96,06 % e si può giocare a partire da soli 20 centesimi per giro.
Per quanto riguarda la struttura di gioco, questa è abbastanza tradizionale, con cinque rulli, quattro righe e ben 1.024 linee di pagamento.
Simboli e funzionalità speciali di Cash Noire
La NetEnt ha fatto in modo che questo gioco sia strutturato proprio come una sorta di romanzo, con un filo che lega le varie funzionalità in una trama comune.
I simboli che si alternano sui rulli di Cash Noire sono interamente tematici e includono, tra gli altri, il detective, due bellissime donne, pistola e proiettili, il gangster, una scatola di fiammiferi e una lente d’ingrandimento.
Ciò che rende interessante il gioco sono le varie funzionalità, a partire dal sistema di gioco chiamato “Avalanche”: i simboli che hanno determinato una combinazione vincente vengono spazzati via dai rulli e sostituiti da una cascata di altre icone.
Tra le altre funzioni , ricordiamo quella free spins, che regala dei giri gratuiti, e alcune special features, tra le quali la Mystery Symbols.

raw_translation.response:
Released in June 2020, Cash Noire is one of the latest slots produced by renowned software house NetEnt. The game's theme is inspired by the world of crime fiction, with a background that is a true crime scene, featuring criminals, investigators and of course, the ever-present femmes fatales. The initial screen of Cash Noire opens with the enigmatic face of an investigator, immersed in an urban scenario with dreary outlines, illuminated by neon lights that make the scene very suggestive and eerie.

The game screen features the same dark colors, and the symbols alternated on the reels are reproduced while maintaining the style and atmosphere of the theme. NetEnt's slot machines have always stood out for their particularly well-crafted graphic compartments, and even in the case of Cash Noire, the sharpness and realism of the images, combined with a skilled use of colors, immerse the player in a seedy Los Angeles in the company of guards and thieves. It is a gaming experience that we are certain will hold you glued to the screen.

Main features of the slot machine
Let's be clear, if you are looking for a highly elaborate slot, characterized by high volatility and the chance to obtain stellar jackpots, Cash Noire may not be the game for you. This NetEnt slot machine could easily be defined as "a slot for everyone," whether you are an experienced player or are just entering the world of spinning reels. Cash Noire has a very easy and intuitive gameplay, with low volatility that guarantees constant prizes, albeit not too high, and supported by an elegant graphic design. The highest possible win is 5,000 times the bet, while the RTP is a more than satisfactory 96.06%, and you can play starting from just 20 cents per spin.

As for the game structure, it is quite traditional, with five reels, four rows, and well, 1,024 paylines. The symbols that alternate on the reels of Cash Noire are entirely thematic and include, among others, the detective, two beautiful women, a gun and bullets, the gangster, a box of matches, and a magnifying glass.

Symbols and special features of Cash Noire
NetEnt has structured this game just like a sort of novel, with a thread that links the various functions into a common plot. The symbols that alternate on the reels of Cash Noire are entirely thematic and include, among others, the detective, two beautiful women, a gun and bullets, the gangster, a box of matches, and a magnifying glass.

What makes the game interesting are the various functionalities, starting from the game system called "Avalanche": the symbols that have determined a winning combination are swept away from the reels and replaced by a cascade of other icons. Among the other features, we recall the free spins function, which gives out free spins, and some special features, such as the Mystery Symbols.

Released in June 2020, Cash Noire is one of the latest slot games from the renowned software house NetEnt. The game's theme revolves around the world of detective novels, with a background that resembles a crime scene, complete with criminals, investigators, and of course, the omnipresent femmes fatale. 

Cash Noire's initial screen features the enigmatic face of an investigator, immersed in an urban setting with a foreboding atmosphere, illuminated by neon lights that create a spooky and mysterious ambiance. The game screen retains the same dark colors and symbols that alternates on the reels, maintaining the style and atmosphere of the theme. 

NetEnt slot machines are known for their particularly polished graphics, and Cash Noire is no exception. The sharpness and realism of the images, combined with the skilled use of colors, immerses the player in a notorious Los Angeles setting, in the company of guards and thieves, for a gaming experience that is guaranteed to keep you glued to the screen.

Main Features of the Slot Machine
Let's get right to it: if you are looking for a highly elaborate slot machine with a high volatility and the possibility of obtaining stellar jackpots, well, in this case, Cash Noire may not be the game for you. This NetEnt slot machine can be easily defined as "a slot for everyone," whether you are experienced players or new to the world of spinning reels. 

Cash Noire is a game with a very easy and intuitive gameplay and low volatility, guaranteeing constant, albeit not too high wins, and supported by an elegant graphics. Regarding the game structure, it is quite traditional, with five reels, four rows, and 1,024 paylines.

response.headline: Gameplay
response.content: Cash Noire has an easy and intuitive gameplay that is perfect for both experienced and new players. It has low volatility which guarantees frequent wins, albeit not too high. The game's structure is quite traditional with five reels, four rows, and 1,024 paylines.

response.headline: Graphics
response.content: The graphics of Cash Noire are one of its highlights. It features a dark and moody theme inspired by the world of crime fiction. The imagery is well-crafted, realistic, and sharp, immersing the players in a seedy Los Angeles environment. The urban scenes are illuminated by neon lights, creating an eerie atmosphere that is suggestive and immersive. The symbols and the game screen feature dark colors that convey the game's theme perfectly.

response.headline: Payouts
response.content: The highest possible win in Cash Noire is 5,000 times the bet, and the return to player (RTP) is 96.06%. The low volatility of the game ensures that the player gets frequent payouts, although not high. It is a game suitable for those looking for a casual and relaxing spinning experience rather than winning a substantial sum of money.

response.headline: Features
response.content: Cash Noire has various functionalities making it an engaging and exciting game. The game system called 'Avalanche' sweeps away the symbols that formed a winning combination and replaces them with a cascade of other icons. The free spins feature gives out free spins, while the Mystery Symbols feature increases the player's chances of winning. The game has a thread that links the various features together in a common plot, and the symbols are entirely thematic.

response.headline: Paylines
response.content: Cash Noire has 1,024 ways to win, the paylines of the game. It means that winning combinations can appear anywhere on adjacent reels, rather than on specific lines. It adds to the game's overall simplicity and easy-to-understand gameplay. The symbols such as the detective, two women, the gangster, gun and bullets, a box of matches, and a magnifying glass all play a part in forming winning combinations and adding to the game's overall thematic experience.

Paylines and Betting Range

Cash Noire has 1,024 paylines, providing plenty of opportunities to win. The game's betting range is flexible, with a minimum bet of 20 cents per spin. The highest possible win is 5,000 times the bet amount, making it suitable for all types of players.

Symbols and Special Features

Cash Noire's symbols are entirely thematic, including a detective, two beautiful women, a gun and bullets, a gangster, a box of matches, and a magnifying glass. One of the unique features of the game is the Avalanche system, where symbols that form a winning combination disappear and are replaced. The game also offers free spins and Mystery Symbols for players to win extra payouts.

Volatility and RTP

Cash Noire has low volatility, which guarantees constant but not too high payouts, making it perfect for beginners and experienced players. The game's RTP is 96.06%, which is above the industry average. This means that players can expect a generous payout over time when playing the game.

Review: Released in June 2020, Cash Noire is one of the latest slots produced by renowned software house NetEnt. The game's theme is inspired by the world of crime fiction, with a background that is a true crime scene, featuring criminals, investigators and of course, the ever-present femmes fatales. The initial screen of Cash Noire opens with the enigmatic face of an investigator, immersed in an urban scenario with dreary outlines, illuminated by neon lights that make the scene very suggestive and eerie.

The game screen features the same dark colors, and the symbols alternated on the reels are reproduced while maintaining the style and atmosphere of the theme. NetEnt's slot machines have always stood out for their particularly well-crafted graphic compartments, and even in the case of Cash Noire, the sharpness and realism of the images, combined with a skilled use of colors, immerse the player in a seedy Los Angeles in the company of guards and thieves. It is a gaming experience that we are certain will hold you glued to the screen.

Main features of the slot machine
Let's be clear, if you are looking for a highly elaborate slot, characterized by high volatility and the chance to obtain stellar jackpots, Cash Noire may not be the game for you. This NetEnt slot machine could easily be defined as "a slot for everyone," whether you are an experienced player or are just entering the world of spinning reels. Cash Noire has a very easy and intuitive gameplay, with low volatility that guarantees constant prizes, albeit not too high, and supported by an elegant graphic design. The highest possible win is 5,000 times the bet, while the RTP is a more than satisfactory 96.06%, and you can play starting from just 20 cents per spin.

As for the game structure, it is quite traditional, with five reels, four rows, and well, 1,024 paylines. The symbols that alternate on the reels of Cash Noire are entirely thematic and include, among others, the detective, two beautiful women, a gun and bullets, the gangster, a box of matches, and a magnifying glass.

Symbols and special features of Cash Noire
NetEnt has structured this game just like a sort of novel, with a thread that links the various functions into a common plot. The symbols that alternate on the reels of Cash Noire are entirely thematic and include, among others, the detective, two beautiful women, a gun and bullets, the gangster, a box of matches, and a magnifying glass.

What makes the game interesting are the various functionalities, starting from the game system called "Avalanche": the symbols that have determined a winning combination are swept away from the reels and replaced by a cascade of other icons. Among the other features, we recall the free spins function, which gives out free spins, and some special features, such as the Mystery Symbols.
